name: Crypt Witch
aura: Increases Ally SPD in Faction Crypts by 20.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Deals 30% more damage if the target has any buffs. Will ignore [Shield] and [Block Damage] buffs.
skills.name: Fetid Steel

skills.desc: Attacks 2 times at random. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 50% of the target's DEF if the target is faster than this Champion.
